mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_STYBOARD.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO STYBOARD (BNO, STYNO, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BDATE) VALUES (#{bno}, #{styno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT Z.*, NVL(LC.CLICK,'N') AS CLICK, NVL(LK.LIKE_COUNT,0) AS LIKEC FROM ( SELECT Y.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, X.* FROM ( SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.BCONTENT, BI.IMGPATH, SL.ISPRE FROM STYBOARD B JOIN STYBOARD_IMAGES BI ON B.BNO = BI.BNO JOIN STYLIST SL ON SL.STYNO = B.STYNO WHERE BI.IMGLEVEL = 0 AND (B.BTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR B.BCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR SL.SHOPNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR SL.SHOPADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%') ORDER BY SL.ISPRE DESC, B.BNO DESC ) X ) Y WHERE Y.NUM >= #{startIndex} AND Y.NUM <= #{endIndex} ) Z LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BNO, COUNT(*) LIKE_COUNT FROM STYLIKE GROUP BY BNO ) LK ON LK.BNO = Z.BNO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BNO, 'Y' CLICK FROM STYLIKE L WHERE L.MNO = #{mno} ) LC ON LC.BNO = Z.BNO ORDER BY NUM
SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.BCONTENT, B.BDATE, S.MNO, S.SHOPNAME, S.SHOPPHONE, S.SHOPADDRESS, S.BSNO FROM STYBOARD B JOIN STYLIST S ON B.STYNO = S.STYNO WHERE B.BNO = #{bno}
SELECT IMGPATH FROM STYBOARD_IMAGES WHERE BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY IMGLEVEL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM STYLIKE WHERE BNO = #{bno} AND MNO = #{mno}
mapper.update: UPDATE STYBOARD_IMAGES SET ISDELETE = 'Y' WHERE BNO = #{bno}
